name: Open Disk info view by click on disk button
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Create new project via **API**.
- Create new Disk.

### Verify that:

- After click on disk button Disk info view appears.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Create new project via API.
  • Create new Disk.

Verify that:

  • After click on disk button Disk info view appears.
